product_name: Stonewear Designs Stonewear Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Stonewear Pants epitomize the Stonewear Designs brand. They're made from comfortable stretch cotton with a lined gusset and a "V" waistband that flatters almost any body type. Cotton/spandex fabric breathes and stretches with you in total comfort. Straight-leg styling offers unrestricted movement for yoga and other workouts. Slimming "V" crossover waistband provides a comfortable, flattering fit. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Stonewear Pants epitomize the Stonewear Designs brand. They're made from comfortable stretch cotton with a lined gusset and a "V" waistband that flatters almost any body type.
